comment.label_en: This query form allows you to select one or more users to view training information.

list-editable.assistance_dql: SELECT user_name FROM dm_user where r_is_group = 0 and client_capability < 8 and user_name not like 'dm\_%' ESCAPE '\' and user_name not like 'dmc%' and user_name not like 'd2\_%' ESCAPE '\' order by user_name
